help-file.title: "WORD OF RECALL"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Teleportation
The caster will be instantly transferred back to his/her sanctuary (the appropriate guildhall or the proper hometown).
WARNING: If the caster is overburdened they may leave some items behind at the spot where the spell was cast.
